description: Get a rule set by its name. A rule set is always attached to a resource and contains a

account_id.description: Databricks account ID of any type.

name.description: A name for a rule set on the account.

etag.description: An etag encoded a specific version of the rule set to get or to be updated.

principals.description: Principals this grant rule applies to.

etag.description: Identifies the version of the rule set returned.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.
